description:
To be honest, I don't really know a lot about Perry. Let's just say that he wasn't exactly a font of information.

What I do know: He's from the midwest, he has pretty green eyes, he likes motorcycles, and he thought it was funny that I asked him to ejaculate on his own thigh.

I did ask him early on what his thoughts were on doing "stuff" with other guys. The answer was a resounding "No". Maybe that's why the font dried up. I don't know.

Going down to the beach was his favorite part of the shoot, and by the way he was looking at the girls in their bikinis I didn't have to ask if he was straight.
title: Perry
